description: Reduce Grapple Cooldown of the designated Resonator in the team by 15% for 15 minutes. This effect only applies on your own characters in Co-op Mode.
bgDescription: A must-have dish in the Panhua Restaurant, the poached chicken is added with a special sauce. Some people want to replicate the taste of the Panhua Restaurant's Poached Chicken, but there is always a difference. After all, a restaurant must have some skills.
